name: Keys
description:
This is a story told in three parts, this is but the first act in the trilogy of a man and the threads of fate that bind him. Dim lighting, comedy, and simple puzzles add to the story's atmosphere.

This game features:

A spawn rate of enemies based on luck
Voice acting with text as subtitles
3-5 hours of game play, variable on how many/few spawns the player gets
A few easter eggs to pop culture and nerd references (see if you can find them all!)
Puns and humorous banter
And my playtesters found the story compelling.
